sourcesContent:
import { Box, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Center, Heading, Image, Text } from "@chakra-ui/react";

export default function Song() {
    return (
        <Box position="relative" marginX={30} >
            <Card h="70vh" w="40vw" borderRadius="35px">
                <CardHeader>
                    <Center>
                        <Box>
                            <Image
                                borderRadius='full'
                                height="13vw"
                                width="13vw"
                                src='https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSHhgym4kW-5jjHNHZGCngIruP-9rhgz42PDw'
                            />
                        </Box>
                    </Center>
                </CardHeader>
                <CardBody >
                    <Center marginTop="1vh">
                        <Heading as="b" size="xl">Título</Heading>
                    </Center>
                    <Center>
                        <Heading as="b" size="md">Artista</Heading>
                    </Center>
                    <Center display="block">
                        <Box display="flex">
                            <Text fontSize='xl' as="b" marginX="5%" width="20%">Album</Text>
                            <Text fontSize='xl' marginLeft="5%">Album</Text>
                        </Box>
                        <Box display="flex" >
                            <Text fontSize='xl' as="b" marginX="5%" width="20%">Año</Text>
                            <Text fontSize='xl' marginLeft="5%">Año</Text>
                        </Box>
                        <Box >
                            <Text fontSize='xl' as="b" marginX="5%" width="20%">Duración</Text>
                            <Text fontSize='xl' marginLeft="5%">Duración</Text>
                        </Box>
                    </Center>
                </CardBody>
            </Card>
        </Box>
    );
}
